name: Frosten
description:
[Controls: Use WASD to move and SpaceBar to Jump!]

Frosten is a platforming game with a twist: Every 10 seconds your current block is frozen at your position, and you respawn at the nearest checkpoint!  The music stays in sync with the freezing to help you time your jumps and keep things interesting.

Have fun avoiding the spikes and jumping into your almost-doom at exactly the right time...

Timing is key!

This was a two man project, and everything here is completely custom from scratch and made in Unity, Blender, and Bitwig Studio. This is our first game jam!  It was VERY hard on Kaech who didn't sleep much. Please support him with your feedback =-D

I (Cypheus) hope you love the music. I just started doing music production a few months ago and would love your feedback on the soundscape. There's about 5 minutes of completely custom music in the game! We'd love if you stuck around to hear it all at least once!

(This game had game-breaking bugs when we first uploaded, but we just uploaded a version that doesn't crash on Menu or Death! Yay!)
